name: Pair_allMatchTest
description: Unit tests for the Pair.allMatch method, which checks if all elements in two lists match based on a given predicate.

test_cases.name: testAllMatch_AllElementsMatch
test_cases.description: Tests that all elements in two lists match when the predicate is Integer::equals.

test_cases.name: testAllMatch_NotAllElementsMatch
test_cases.description: Tests that not all elements in two lists match when the predicate is Integer::equals.

test_cases.name: testAllMatch_DifferentLengths
test_cases.description: Tests the behavior of Pair.allMatch when the two lists have different lengths.

test_cases.name: testAllMatch_EmptyCollections
test_cases.description: Tests the behavior of Pair.allMatch when both lists are empty.
